transArray.content: Relatives said it was pretty good and close to Chaoyang Station.

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! The hotel is the new version of Hanting 2.7, with novel decoration and complete facilities. During the epidemic, the hotel strictly followed the epidemic prevention requirements and strictly disinfected and cleaned every room and corner of the hotel. We also have dedicated personnel to clean and disinfect the hotel every day. Each room is strictly inspected before it can be sold, so that every passenger can stay at ease. We also look forward to your visit again. I wish you a happy life!
